title: Find the LCD
speech: LCD of  fraction, y over, y plus 6,  , , fraction, 72 over, y squared minus 36,  , and  4  is  parentheses y plus 6,  times, parentheses y minus 6,  .
pacedSpeech: LCD of   fraction, y over, y plus 6,
is    y plus 6,  times,  y minus 6,

title: Clear All Fractions
text: We must multiply each fraction by the LCD. We get $$y(y-6)=72+4\left(y^2-36\right)$$.
speech: We must multiply each fraction by the LCD. We get  y, parentheses y minus 6,  is equal to 72 plus 4 times, parentheses, y squared minus 36,  .
pacedSpeech: We must multiply each fraction by the LCD. We get   y,  y minus 6,  is equal to 72 plus 4 times, , y squared minus 36,

title: Simplify the Equation
text: Let's simplify this equation: $$y^2-6y=72+4y^2-144$$. This becomes $$y^2+2y-24=0$$.
speech: Let's simplify this equation:  y squared minus 6 y is equal to 72 plus 4 y squared, minus 144 . This becomes  y squared, plus 2 y minus 24 is equal to 0 .

title: Solve the Equation
text: Let's factor to solve. $$0=\left(y+6\right) \left(y-4\right)$$. $$y=-6$$, $$y=4$$. $$y=-6$$ is extraneous since it is in the original denominator. So, our solution is $$y=4$$.
